name: Going Nutz
description:
Controls:

WASD: Up, Left, Down, Right

SPACE: Shoots Projectiles in the Direction Player is Facing

Q: Brings Duck to Waypoint Location

It's spring time in the forest, so it's time to find the nuts you stored away for the spring, but you can't do it alone. With the help of your team of excavating ducks, gather the most valuable nuts hidden below the surface. Watch out because there may be critters lurking below that want to take your tasty nuts away. Defend your duck crew and collect your surplus.
